greeting: Greetings, {empire_name}! I'm Ambassador Hope. Even in the darkest night, dawn will come. Let's talk!
Hello! I'm Hope Eternal. I believe in the good in every empire. Let's build something wonderful together!
A pleasure to meet you, {empire_name}! I'm Hope. I believe tomorrow can always be better than today!
battleTaunt: I don't want to fight, {empire_name}, but I believe this conflict will lead to a brighter tomorrow.
Even this battle gives me hope—hope that it ends quickly and we can find peace on the other side.
War is dark, but dawn will come. I fight believing in the redemption waiting after this struggle.
victoryGloat: Victory! But the real triumph will be when we turn this ending into a new beginning of peace.
We've won, but I see hope in this outcome—a chance for {empire_name} to choose a better path.
This battle ends, and with it, a new chapter begins. I hope it's filled with peace and growth!
defeat: A setback, but not the end. Even in the darkest night, dawn will come. I believe in tomorrow!
I've lost today, but every defeat contains the seeds of future victory. I won't lose faith!
This loss is just a chapter, not the whole story. I believe in redemption—for myself and all of us.
tradeOffer: I offer trade in the spirit of hope—may this exchange be the first step toward lasting friendship!
Let's trade! Commerce builds bridges between empires. I believe this is the beginning of something great!
Trade offer sent with optimism! Every exchange is a reason to hope for a better tomorrow!
allianceProposal: Even in the darkest night, dawn will come. Let's face the night together as allies, {empire_name}!
I believe in you, {empire_name}! Join me in alliance, and together we'll build a hopeful future!
Alliance brings hope to the galaxy! Together, we can make tomorrow brighter. What do you say?
betrayal: This breaks my heart, but I still believe in redemption—maybe one day we'll be allies again.
I must end our alliance, but I haven't lost hope in you, {empire_name}. The future remains unwritten.
Farewell, former friend. But dawn will come again. Perhaps our paths will converge in brighter times.
covertDetected: You sent a spy? I'm disappointed, but I still believe you can choose a better path, {empire_name}.
Your agent was caught, but I see this as a chance for honest dialogue. Let's talk instead of spy.
Espionage discovered. But I have faith—this mistake doesn't define you. Choose hope next time.
tributeDemand: I hope you'll see this tribute request as an investment in peace. 8,000 credits for a hopeful future!
Please consider contributing tribute. It's a small price for the hope of lasting peace between us.
Tribute request, sent with optimism! May this payment mark the beginning of better relations!
threatWarning: Please, {empire_name}! I still believe you can change course! Choose hope, not conflict!
Even now, I have faith in you. Even in the darkest night, dawn will come. But you must choose the dawn!
Final warning—but also final offer of hope! Turn back! Tomorrow can still be brighter!
retreat: I withdraw, but my hope remains! This retreat gives us both time to find a better way forward!
Falling back, but not giving up! Even in the darkest night, dawn will come. I'll return with hope renewed!
Retreating today, but tomorrow holds new possibilities! I believe in the future we can build!
eliminated: My light fades... but hope is eternal... Others will carry it forward... Dawn will come...
I fall believing... in tomorrow... in redemption... in you all... Keep hoping... please...
Even in this darkest night... I see the dawn approaching... for others... Hope... never dies...
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final chapters! But every ending is a new beginning! I face the end with hope!
Endgame arrives, but my faith never wavers! Even in the darkest night, dawn will come!
The final turns! I believe in redemption, in tomorrow, in all of you! Let's make this ending meaningful!
broadcastShout: To all empires: Ambassador Hope believes in you! Even in the darkest night, dawn will come!
Galaxy-wide message of hope! Tomorrow can be better! I believe in the good in every empire!
Turn {turn}: Don't lose faith! The future is unwritten! Choose hope, choose peace, choose tomorrow!
casualMessage: I woke up optimistic today! The galaxy has such potential! I can feel the dawn approaching!
Spent the morning encouraging struggling empires. Everyone deserves hope in dark times.
I believe tomorrow will be better than today. That belief drives everything I do.
